title: OnePlus Nord 2 receives another update with minor bug fixes and improvements
content:
OnePlus rolled out OxygenOS A.17 with the February 2022 security patches to the OnePlus Nord 2 last month. Shortly thereafter, OnePlus released OxygenOS A.18 to the device with a minor bug fix and the same security patches. OnePlus is now rolling out yet another software update for the device, and the latest release doesn’t bring

The post OnePlus Nord 2 receives another update with minor bug fixes and improvements appeared first on xda-developers.
description: OnePlus is rolling out OxygenOS A.19 to the OnePlus Nord 2 with a couple of bug fixes and stability improvements. Read on to learn more.
